content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext.Claim_insurance (
	[Claim_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[insurance_coverage_display] nvarchar(4000),
	[insurance_focal] bit,
	[insurance_sequence] bigint
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Claim_insurance/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [silver_amheroldhackathonstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO




CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext.Claim_main (
	[Claim_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[resourceType] nvarchar(4000),
	[status] nvarchar(4000),
	[billablePeriod_end] nvarchar(4000),
	[billablePeriod_start] nvarchar(4000),
	[created] nvarchar(4000),
	[patient_display] nvarchar(4000),
	[patient_id_reference] nvarchar(4000),
	[prescription_reference] nvarchar(4000),
	[provider_display] nvarchar(4000),
	[provider_org_id_reference] nvarchar(4000),
	[total_currency] nvarchar(4000),
	[total_value] float,
	[use] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Claim_main/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [silver_amheroldhackathonstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO




CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext.Claim_procedure (
	[Claim_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[procedure_reference] nvarchar(4000),
	[procedure_sequence] bigint
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Claim_procedure/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [silver_amheroldhackathonstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext.Claim_diagnosis (
	[Claim_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[diagnosis_reference] nvarchar(4000),
	[diagnosis_sequence] bigint
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Claim_diagnosis/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [silver_amheroldhackathonstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO
